name: Frog Life (Latrop)
description:
Help the frog live until spring and find its soul mate. You have to overcome all the hardships of the life of an amphibian and be able to leave offspring. You have to eat small bugs, keeping the temperature normal along the way. You should be vigilant, because there are those who want to eat you.

Music by Jason Shaw

Mini Jam 106: Frogs²
